title: First-aid firefighting equipment shall be provided on all floors including basements lift rooms, etc
clause_text: First-aid firefighting equipment shall be provided on all floors including basements lift rooms, etc. in accordance with IS: 2217-1963 Recommendations for providing First-Aid Fire Fighting Arrangements in Public Buildings.
section: Provision of First Aid and Fire-fighting Appliances

source_pdf.text_snippet: First-aid firefighting equipment shall be provided on all floors including basements lift rooms, etc. in accordance with IS: 2217-1963 Recommendations for providing First-Aid Fire Fighting Arrangement
